issue.title: The definition of move-assignment operator is redundant

discussion.p: This definition of move-assignment operator is redundant and confusing now that the term move-assignment operator is defined by the core language in subclause 12.8p21.

blockquote.p: Accepting n3142 provides a superior resolution.

discussion.p: Strike subclause . Add a cross-reference to (12.8) to 17.3.12.
